Exactly as pictured and SO COMFY! there is an inner drawstring so they are nice and adjustable. They are fluffy inside and a nice medium thickness.  I'm buying a second pair right now so I decided to also put in the review.

评论详情: when i got these i put them in the washer as i normally do, and the rim of the patches detached from the pants and left behind a white line of string. other than that, it was pretty comfortable. the waist band was tight and sorta felt like it was suffocating my waist. the color was cute. this definitely should’ve been worth about $15 though, so waste of money.

These are very cute. Although the sizing is not accurate. The waist band is super thick with a very tight stretch. I bought large so it would sit baggy on me. I am model height 5'10 and small 27" waist. These are 26" at the waist. The elastic band is so tight it barely stretches past that.  Otherwise I would love loved them.
Good quality and quick delivery
My daughter loves these grey sweat pants. Cute with any top for her causal style for school. Fit true to size, fabric thick and soft.

These sweats are made with the 90s style in mind (they’re calling it y2k) but they miss the mark in an important way. These are meant to sit on your hips comfortably BUT there is too much material in the front so they’re not even with the back and your stuck with enough extra material that you must roll the front over but not the back. You can see it’s not evenly distributed and cut when you look at the waist. Also, the stars on them are not adhered properly so they start to curl. Let’s face it, you can wear them out when they’re new but after that they are house pants.
Perfect fit and material is nice and comfortable.

So far, I have worn it one time, but it is a little tight and I will probably give it to one of my daughter's who's smaller than I am. If these sweatpants are covered by a long shirt, it will look okay but seeing how it looks weird on the waist, it can't be matched with midriffs or tight, shorter tops.

I bought these in a medium size, usually being a small. They were made of horrible fabric, did not fit well, did not look good, and the star pattern was already falling off. I would not recommend. Find one with better quality and a size guide.
